name: Project Evenity 0.0.3
description:
This is a maze game, that is in a work of progress. I plan on making this a first person maze shooter one day. If you feel my hours of work are worth anything please pay what you feel it is worth.

STAY AWAY FROM CORNERS!!!! Game breaking bug

Controls: f4= Fullscren f3= Screenshot R=Restart Esc= Quit game
